bookSourceComment:
// Error: 搜索失效

/*
version: 2025.0321
完善发现,添加搜索接口by河鹅和
优化搜索发现
目录乱序修复by折木
目录乱序修复可通过设置书籍变量来开启，默认关闭
发现添加最新入库，需要先登录构造本地数据
添加本地搜索，可通过构造的本地数据进行搜索，在搜索关键词前加上name:,id:,author:,tags:即可指定搜索类型，默认为搜索书名，例子：author:佚名
当前支持类型有author,category,id,intro,name,pornrate,score,status,tags,update,word,all，分别是搜索作者,分类,书ID,简介,书名,肉量,评分,状态,标签,更新,字数,全部
发现自动添加书籍到本地数据
本地搜索支持正则，例：id:^95[5-9]\d$、all:(白天|黑夜)
添加更多排序选择
添加设置每次并发数
2025.01.31 修改本地数据保存方法，不再保存到源变量
02.01 优化目录乱序修复
02.04 优化本地数据保存，将数据切分每50万个字符保存，数据网络导出最大为10M，超过10M请使用本地导出
02.05 优化生成发现方法
02.23 优化本地导入，现在本地导入支持非阅读缓存路径了，需要以/storage开头
02.24 添加直链上传选项，可以将直链规则填到直链上传规则，然后使用直链上传了
02.25 添加对直链上传规则是否压缩的支持，现在可以通过修改直链规则中的compress项为true，即可通过直链导出为zip文件，并且支持阅读缓存相对路径下的zip文件和网络zip文件数据的导入
02.26 优化解析直链上传规则downloadUrlRule
03.01 添加一键更新
03.20 添加目录和正文本地化，可通过修改jslib的dataPath来选择保存路径，阅读版本小于3.23.1102的不确定能否正常使用，不能正常使用请回退到0301版书源
03.21 添加正文缓存到本地
*/

<js>
if (String(baseUrl).startsWith("http")) {
	id = String(baseUrl).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
} else {
	id = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")[0]
	try {
		result = java.get(`${sourceKey}/book/${id}/`, source.getHeaderMap(false)).body()
		java.setContent(result)
	} catch (e) {
		result = ""
	}
}
try {
	let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
	id_1 = String(e.select('[property="og:novel:read_url"]').attr("content")).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
	if (id != id_1) {
		throw new Error("id不一致")
	}
	author = e.select('[property="og:novel:author"]').attr("content")
	name = e.select('[property="og:novel:book_name"]').attr("content")
	wordCount = e.select(".wordcount dd").text()
	lastChapter = e.select('[property~=las?test_chapter_name]').attr("content")
	coverUrl = e.select('[property="og:image"]').attr("content")
	category = Object.values(e.select(".categories a").textNodes())
	status = e.select('[property="og:novel:status"]').attr("content")
	update = String(e.select('.new dd').textNodes()[0]).trim()
	tags = Object.values(e.select('.tag a').textNodes())
	kind = category.concat([status, update]).join(",")
	info = java.getString("@.book-desc@textNodes")
	pornrate = e.select('.pornrate dd').text()
	score = Number(e.select('.score dd').text())
	intro = `  
🆔:${id} 📈评分:${score} 💗肉量:${pornrate} 
👁️观看:${e.select('.onclick dd').text()}   💌收藏:${e.select('.collect dd').text()}
📝 简介：${info}
🔖 标签：${tags.join(",")}
🕰 更新：${java.getString('[property~=update_time]@content')}`
	createFile(String(e.select(".book-chapter")), `/book/${id}/index.html`)
	v = checkData()
	v.books[id] = {
		author: author,
		category: category,
		cover: String(coverUrl).replace(/.*file\/cover\//, ""),
		intro: info,
		name: name,
		pornrate: pornrate,
		score: score,
		status: status,
		tags: tags,
		update: update,
		word: wordCount
	}
	setv(v)
} catch (error) {
	java.log(error)
	var {
		name,
		author,
		kind,
		wordCount,
		intro,
		coverUrl
	} = book
	lastChapter = ""
}
bookInfo = {
	name: name,
	author: author,
	kind: kind,
	wordCount: wordCount,
	lastChapter: lastChapter,
	intro: intro,
	coverUrl: coverUrl,
	tocUrl: toDataUrl(id)
}
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.log(baseUrl)
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key, page, sortType] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
	if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word|all)[:]/.test(key)) {
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
	} else {
		[key, page] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
		type="name"
	}
	$=checkData()
	books=$.books
	booklist=[]
	for (let i in books) {
		books[i]["id"]=i
		type == "all" ? Object.defineProperty(books[i], 'all', {
			get: function(){
				return JSON.stringify(this)
			}
		}) : ""
		booklist.push(books[i])
	}
	Regkey=createRegExp(key)
	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {
		st = sortType || $.sortType
		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()
 	}
 	if (booklist.length>0&&page==0) java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍\n当前为按${$.sortType=="pornrate"?"肉量":($.sortType=="score"?"评分":($.sortType=="word"?"字数":($.sortType=="update"?"更新":"ID")))}${$.order?"⬆️正":"⬇️倒"}序排列`)
 	else if ((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0) java.toast("\n❎本地数据未找到，请切换搜索接口")
 	booklist=getl(booklist,page);
 	java.setContent(JSON.stringify(booklist))
 	result=java.getElements("$[*]")
}else result=java.getElements(".book-like a||.grid-item")
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
id=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")[0]
if (Date.now() - book.latestChapterTime > 10000){
	java.log('更新目录')
	java.refreshTocUrl()
}
result=readFile(`/book/${id}/index.html`)
let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let chapterNumber = 0;
if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\n✅目录乱序修复已开启")
	   chapters.forEach((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/第(\d+)(-\d+)?章/);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: item.attr("href")
        });
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = chapters
}
chapterData
</js>

var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;


var document = JsDom.parse(src);

sections.forEach(function(section) {
    var vol = section.select(".catalog-section-title").text();
    var articles = section.select(".article-list > .article-item > .article-title > a");
    articles.forEach(function(article) {
        var url = article.attr("href");
        var text = article.text();
        result.push({
            "url": url,
            "text": text,
            "vol": vol
        });
    });
});

result;

<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>##.*{{book.name}}.*收藏.*

25.02.16修改部分规则，修改发现规则
25.02.20修复封面
25.03.04完善规则
靈狐 制，可拷贝书源，更改源URL当不同源用
书架书籍与源URL绑定，如站点变动可在登录里自定义站点来避免重新添加书架
24-05-13 修复乱序
24-06-04 发现与更多模板支持
理论支持全部69网站使用，发现若错乱请刷新
24-07-02 支持更多模板，部分站点只有排行榜，暂不予适配发现
24-07-13 目录排序，支持无标记正文排序，支持设置源变量改变搜索、发现
24-07-18 发现支持筛选、单页，源变量设置可改变所有页面，优化正文标题净化
24-09-18 支持移除目录重复条目，详情页添加标签，移除正文解密、排序，登录进行源站相关设置（强制保持：强制替换站点为当前站点），添加过cf盾
24-09-20 避免因Cookie丢失导致页面被缓存无法过盾，可设置封面为69默认封面
24-09-21 添加新的封面链接，加入随机UA功能
24-09-28 修复站点目录，发现添加最近更新（如果有），封面修复改良

}

}

//修整内容后依次拼接
for(i=0;i<zuozhe.length;i++){
txt=String(neir[i]).replace(/\s/g,"\n");
zz=String(zuozhe[i]).replace(/ 发表.*/,"");
sj=String(shijian[i]).replace(/.*发表/,"发表");
java.log(zz+lz);

//只看楼主
if (book.getVariable("custom")!=""){

  list=list+"\n@"+zz+"__"+sj+"\n"+txt+"\n————\n";

}
list

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let name = java.getString("h2@text");
let author = java.getString(".MuiStack-root.0@a@text");
let kind = java.getStringList(".MuiStack-root.3@span!0@text").toArray();
let wordCount = java.getString(".MuiStack-root.1@span.1@text");
let lastChapter = java.getString(".MuiStack-root.4@a@text");
let lastChapterTime = java.getString(".MuiStack-root.3@span.0@text");
let coverUrl = java.getString(".MuiGrid-root.MuiGrid-item img@data-src");
let tocUrl = java.getString(".MuiGrid-item.0@a.0@href");

let tags = java.getStringList(".MuiStack-root.-3@a@text");
let description = java.getString(".MuiStack-root.-1@html");
let intro = `　更新日期🕐︎：${lastChapterTime}
　标签🏷︎：${Array(tags).join(",")}
　简介📄：${description}`;

if (kind.find(item => item == "VIP")) {
 let userChapNum = java.getString(".MuiStack-root.-4@span@text");
 let userChap = getUserchap1(java.getString(".MuiStack-root.-4@svg!0@data-testid")).split(" ");
 kind = kind.concat(userChap);
 intro = `　已解锁：${+userChapNum || 0}章
 ${intro}`;
}
result = {
 name: name,
 author: author,
 kind: kind,
 wordCount: wordCount,
 lastChapter: lastChapter,
 intro: intro,
 coverUrl: coverUrl,
 tocUrl: tocUrl
};
if (name.match("什么都没有了呢,5秒后返航")) {
 result = {}
}
JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

function createSign(params) {
	var str = '';
	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {

	});
